text: CD14 positive monocytes from CF patients and controls show similar increases in caspase-1 activity upon inflammasome stimulation
Monocytes were identified in PBMC populations using <extra_id_0> CD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> as a phenotyping marker .

CD14 positive monocytes from CF patients and healthy controls showed a significant increase in caspase-1 activation upon stimulation with LPS+ATP , PAO1 , and LPS+Poly ( dA : dT ) ( Fig . 4a ) but this activation was not different between CF and control subjects ( Fig . 4b ) .
